PerfectNetExp.abs: 而鸡奸者(sodomite),有点类似于杀人犯和纵火犯,同样被认为不道德,但它是一种临时性的性罪行,在性取向问题上和其他“正常人”没有什 …
专业术语之衣食住行_百度文库 ... society 社会 sodomite 鸡奸者，兽奸者 sodomy 鸡奸，兽奸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'sodomy'): via Old French from late Latin Sodomita, from Greek Sodomitēs 'inhabitant of Sodom'

means.word_mean: 1. someone who engages in anal copulation (especially a male who engages in anal copulation with another male)

auth_sentence.content: We don't stone the adulterer or hang the sodomite or massacre the restive inner-city residents.
auth_sentence.res_content: We don't stone the adulterer or hang the sodomite or massacre the restive inner-city residents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We don't stone the adulterer or hang the sodomite or massacre the restive inner-city residents.
